items.title: ‘We are an n of 1’: Palantir hails ‘incredible’ earnings as stock rockets nearly 8% after hours
items.description: Palantir looks into its all-seeing orb and sees full-year revenue between $7.18 billion and $7.2 billion.

items.title: Devon Energy CEO: ‘Stars align’ to acquire Coterra for nearly $26 billion as merger mania returns to the oilfield
items.description: The massive Permian Basin merger creates a combined Devon with a $58 billion enterprise value.

items.title: If AI is roiling the job market, the data isn’t showing it, Yale Budget Lab report says, raising questions of ‘AI-washing’ to justify mass layoffs
items.description: Some analysts have projected AI will displace 7% of U.S. workers. Yale economists said it’s just too early to tell.

items.title: Why Bitcoin is in a bear market: Analyst points to 3 factors after currency swoons below $75,000
items.description: The original cryptocurrency recovered slightly on Monday.

items.title: OpenAI launches Codex app to bring its coding models, which were used to build viral OpenClaw, to more users
items.description: OpenAI is locked in an increasingly intense battle with rival Anthropic over tools to create AI agents. The debut of the Codex app comes weeks after A...
